column5: Does anyone know of a place that can repair ,or sell parts for Gander Mt. reels.The reel is a bait caster that looks a lot like a Pflueger Trion.I bought the reel and did not use it for over a year.I loaned it to a friend for a Canada trip and it didn't last a week.Thanks for any help. Good fishing Pikeman.
The only place I know has parts for them is BassPro Shop. They sold the same reel under their own label and do stock parts. You might give them a call at their repair center.
You may want to just take it into Gander and see if they will replace it. I believe they have a no questions asked replacement policy on their branded reels.

It indeed is the old style Trion chassis reel. But they are not in production now so there will be none in the system to replace it with. Unfortunately yours is far past any return date according to cooperate store polices. It can be repaired by any service center that does Pflueger reel repair, it is a Trion with the Gander name on it.

Thanks guys for your help.I will try Bass Pro.I have always heard good reviews on the Trion family of reels and was suprised when this reel failed so soon.I guess you can always get a bad one. Good fishing, Pikeman
